name: Team Green Warlock - Consume The World
name_original: Team Green Warlock - Consume The World
description:
You will take the role of a mutating killer mushroom! Click 'Release Spores' to release fungus spores into the world, infect, and gain biomass. 

(Press Esc to exit)

  • Programming - Charlie Cooper
  • Art & Designs - Taylor Banks & Khyan Jordan
  • Video - Taylor Banks

All in-game visuals were original and made in Paint.
